summary: Sansa: For this event, I wore the perfect disguise to make sure I was never noticed by anyone. Something so drab and uninspiring...
body:
Sansa: For this event, I wore the perfect disguise to make sure I was never noticed by anyone. Something so drab and uninspiring -

Arya: I feel this is going to be a dig at me.

Sansa: I wore Arya’s clothes.

Arya: There it is.

body:
Arya : Is Jaqen here ?
The Kindly Man : Who are you supposed to be ?
Arya : I'm Arya, his friend.
The Kindly Man : His friends get worse and worse.

blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Un mundo de mentiras
description:
by 0Aressama1

Los crió y los amo como sus hijos, les dio el nombre de una madre y un hogar pero no había nada mas terrible para un Targaryen que estar solos en este mundo. La guerra de los Cinco reyes ha comenzado, pero tal vez la lealtad entre hermanos no es tan fuerte, Jon cuestiona a Robb “Sabes vencer pero tus decisiones personales harán que perdamos esta guerra”. Mientras que Arya sueña con una doncella de cabellos plateados que vuelva sobre un Dragon.

Que pasaría si Jon junto con Arya hubieran nacido como hermanos Gemelos.

Words: 3448, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Español

blog.description:
Welcome to my ramblings! She, older than you, Down Under, blogging about all the things I like.  If you want to know more, go to links...
_______________________________

summary: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair... He wants...
caption: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…

reblog.comment: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…

blog.name: onionjulius
blog.title: on the windy side of care
blog.description:
I'm 33⅓ and I don't write home enough and I am recovering from terminal perfectionism. My sun is in Sagittarius, my moon is in Libra, and my heart is in San Francisco. I get salty about stupid things and then I feel bad. I also get salty about worthy things. I also get salty caramel and pineapple pizza. Most cats are better than people, but most people are okay too.
GOT Secret Santa 2018 tag!

tags: omg ty guys for playing with me <3
summary: Oooh questions time... How do you feel about the Stark girls' respective storylines at the end of aDwD/start of tWoW? And also...
question: Oooh questions time... How do you feel about the Stark girls' respective storylines at the end of aDwD/start of tWoW? And also do you have any opinions on Young Griff and his party/plot
answer:
Oh man, I have yet to finish ADWD XD But I have read spoilers. I’m going to put this under a cut since TWOW is involved.

I think they’re in an interesting enough place, the leaked chapters are definitely showing big jumps in their trajectory. But also, the sexual nature of some of the elements in those leaked chapters is … well I’m waiting to reserve judgment. I don’t know how to feel about that right now though. Obviously, yes, you become a teenager, you’re going through puberty, people in a sexist society will respond to you a certain way. But it also seems like a potential area where the trope is not examined enough. IDK.

Apart from that, I thought it was really conspicuous that they’ve had such few chapters since ASOS. It speaks to a certain lack of endgame, at least at some point in the story’s development. I feel like their chapters have had some really good writing, but I am more than ready for their shows to get on the road. Probably the way a lot of people felt about Dany in, like, ACOK. I also relatedly feel like their fates are more up in the air than the Tyrion/Dany/Jon/Bran lot. Arya was supposed to be in a love triangle with Jon and Tyrion, so now what! Sansa was supposed to be the turncoat or such of the family, so now what! Etc.

The thing is I haven’t really come across any fanon endgames for them that I really like, and for me the biggest thing is to have a certain thematic and character cohesion. So maybe that reflects a kind of latent frustration with their characters too. I feel like their stakes are not defined, other than that they want to go home. So maybe that’s all it’s about, but I dunno … I think so many fanon endgames center around who is ruling what, and I want more than that. Or, like, other than that.

I will give you my opinions about Young Griff as soon as I have them, lol XD I AM TERRIBLE ADWD HAS BEEN OUT FOR YEARS WHAT IS MY PROBLEM.
answer_abstract: Oh man, I have yet to finish ADWD XD But I have read spoilers. I’m going to put this under a cut since TWOW is involved.

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

summary:
Ned, about to tell Cersei about his plan to tell Robert about her and Jaime, to Arya: Why am I about to do this?
Arya: ‘Cause...
body:
Ned, about to tell Cersei about his plan to tell Robert about her and Jaime, to Arya: Why am I about to do this?

Arya: ‘Cause you’re an idiot.

Ned: Oh, yeah…

summary: The Song of the Winter Rose
title: The Song of the Winter Rose
description:
by xxitisbluexx

Jon sabe que debe darle algo de crédito, después de todo Arya había aparecido en las puertas de Invernalia totalmente sola, años después de que todo el mundo la creyera muerta, incluyendo él mismo, pero el regresar a su hogar solamente para encontrarse con que su hermana se ha ido para enfrentar sola la inhospitalidad de los caminos durante el invierno le revuelve el estómago

Series: Part 1 of Two roads. One castle

Jon sabe que debe darle algo de crédito, después de todo Arya había aparecido en las puertas de Invernalia totalmente sola, años después de que todo el mundo la creyera muerta, incluyendo él mismo, pero el regresar a su hogar solamente para encontrarse con que su hermana se ha ido para enfrentar sola la inhospitalidad de los caminos durante el invierno le revuelve el estómago

summary: The 5 GoT spin-offs if I got to plan them
title: The 5 GoT spin-offs if I got to plan them
body:
1. The one that plays thousands of years earlier is nothing but a 5 hour psychedelic dreamscape telling a mythological story about dragons. Great music though.

2. Brienne and Podrick solve crimes. Weekly procedural. 10 seasons.

3. A day-to-day documentation of the weeks Sandor and Arya spent walking around the countryside in season 4. Nothing much happens. Just endless wood- and grasslands and their running commentary. Every episode is 2 hours long and has zero dramatic tension. Kind of like a Let’s Play: Westeros. People watch for the one-liners.

4. A reality show in which Varys, Cersei and Tyrion travel around the continent as wine experts, tasting wines and giving unwanted advice to winemakers. Tywinn has to pay for the whole thing and thus a considerable amount of time each episode is spent on him reacting to the footage.

5. The adventures of Jon Snow, except the whole thing is shot from Ghost’s perspective and Ghost’s inner monologue is the narrator. He is voiced by Arnold Schwarzenegger. Everyone hates the show but can’t stop watching.
